description: Try our easy to follow Strawberry & Lime Cheesecakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cheesecake,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Strawberry & Lime Cheesecakes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 lime, finely grated rind and juice

recipeInstructions.text: Mix together the crushed biscuits and butter and spoon into the base of 4 chunky glasses or ramekins. Press down firmly with the back of a small spoon.

In a bowl, mix the condensed milk and mascarpone until soft and creamy. Stir in the lime rind and juice and spoon into the glasses. Place the glasses or ramekins in the refrigerator for 10 minutes to chill the desserts.
Meanwhile, mix together the strawberries and jam (if the jam is very thick, soften it with a dash of boiling water from the kettle) and spoon over the top of the cheesecakes.
